pl.polidea.treeview

Class AbstractTreeViewAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • pl.polidea.treeview.AbstractTreeViewAdapter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - class for ID of the tree
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public abstract class AbstractTreeViewAdapter<T>
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
implements android.widget.ListAdapter
    Adapter used to feed the table view.

      • getNewChildView

        public abstract android.view.View getNewChildView(TreeNodeInfo<T> treeNodeInfo)
        Called when new view is to be created.
        Parameters:
        treeNodeInfo - node info
        Returns:
        view that should be displayed as tree content

      • updateView

        public abstract android.view.View updateView(android.view.View view,
                           TreeNodeInfo<T> treeNodeInfo)
        Called when new view is going to be reused. You should update the view and fill it in with the data required to display the new information. You can also create a new view, which will mean that the old view will not be reused.
        Parameters:
        view - view that should be updated with the new values
        treeNodeInfo - node info used to populate the view
        Returns:
        view to used as row indented content

      • getBackgroundDrawable

        public android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getBackgroundDrawable(TreeNodeInfo<T> treeNodeInfo)
        Retrieves background drawable for the node.
        Parameters:
        treeNodeInfo - node info
        Returns:
        drawable returned as background for the whole row. Might be null, then default background is used
